description: List of papers on fuzzing smart contracts.

dataset.paper: ContractFuzzer: Fuzzing Smart Contracts for Vulnerability Detection
Harvey: A Greybox Fuzzer for Smart Contracts
Smartian: Enhancing Smart Contract Fuzzing with Static and Dynamic Data-Flow Analyses
sFuzz: An efficient adaptive fuzzer for solidity smart contracts
ETHPLOIT: From Fuzzing to Efficient Exploit Generation against Smart Contracts
SynTest-Solidity: Automated Test Case Generation and Fuzzing for Smart Contracts
CONFUZZIUS: A Data Dependency-Aware Hybrid Fuzzer for Smart Contracts
Towards Smart Hybrid Fuzzing for Smart Contracts
A Fuzz Testing Service for Assuring Smart Contracts†
Learning to Fuzz from Symbolic Execution with Application to Smart Contracts
dataset.authors: Jingxuan He, Mislav Balunović, Nodar Ambroladze, Petar Tsankov, and Martin Vechev
